actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, S. Rept. 93-1287.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to designate certain lands as wilderness.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Designates as wilderness areas lands in the following areas: (1) Chamisso National Wildlife Refuge, Alaska; (2) Simeonof National Wildlife Refuge, Alaska; (3) National Key Deer Refuge, Great White Heron National Wildlife Refuge, and Key West National Wildlife Refuge, Florida; (4) St. Marks Wildlife Refuge, Florida; (5) Blackbreard Island National Wildlife Refuge, Georgia; (6) Wolf Island National Wildlife Refuge, Georgia; (7) Breton National Wildlife Refuge, Louisiana; (8) Moosehorn National Wildlife Refuge, Maine; (9) Brigantine National Wildlife Refuge, New Jersey; (10) Bosque del Apache National Wildlife Refuge, New Mexico; (11) Chase Lake National Wildlife Refuge, North Dakota; (12) Lostwood National Wildlife Refuge, North Dakota; (13) West Sister National Wildlife Refuge, Ohio; and (14) Cape Romain National Wildlife Refuge, South Carolina.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain lands as wilderness.
